chapter.title: KVM
chapter.para: KVMhypervisorshypervisorsKVMThe KVM hypervisor is included in Red Hat Enterprise Linux and CentOS operating systems.

section.title: Prerequisites and Constraints
section.para: All KVM Hosts must follow these guidelines:

listitem.para: Must support HVM (Intel-VT or AMD-V enabled).
Within a single cluster, the hosts must be homogenous. The CPUs must be of the same type, count, and feature flags.
hypervisorsKVMkernel versionsWithin a single cluster, the hosts must be of the same kernel version. For example, if one Host is RHEL6 64 bit, they must all be RHEL6 64 bit.
